summary: Tested proactive monitoring feature and AdminActionsPanel component. Backend: 16/18 tests passed (2 skipped due to missing memberwd product mismatch endpoints). Frontend: All buttons found and working except memberwd Fix Product Mismatch which fails due to missing backend endpoint.

critical.issue: Endpoint does not exist - returns 404. AdminActionsPanel expects this endpoint for Member WD CRM but it's not implemented in backend.
Endpoint does not exist - returns 404. AdminActionsPanel expects this endpoint for Member WD CRM but it's not implemented in backend.

integration_issues.flow: Member WD CRM - Fix Product Mismatch button
integration_issues.issue: Button exists and is clickable but fails with 'Failed to repair product mismatch' error because backend endpoint doesn't exist

action_items: These endpoints exist for bonanza but not for memberwd - AdminActionsPanel component expects both modules to have the same endpoints
critical_code_review_comments: AdminActionsPanel.js (lines 16-29) defines endpoints for both bonanza and memberwd modules
The shared component assumes both modules have identical endpoint structure but memberwd is missing 2 endpoints
ProactiveMonitoringAlert.js component is created but not integrated into main dashboard (as noted in misc_info)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Proactive monitoring feature works correctly. AdminActionsPanel shared component works for DB Bonanza but fails for Member WD CRM's Fix Product Mismatch button because backend endpoints are missing. Main agent needs to implement /api/memberwd/admin/diagnose-product-mismatch and /api/memberwd/admin/repair-product-mismatch endpoints similar to bonanza module.

rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: AdminActionsPanel.js is a shared component that expects both bonanza and memberwd modules to have identical endpoint structure. However, memberwd module is missing diagnose-product-mismatch and repair-product-mismatch endpoints.
rca_of_the_issue.fix_required: Add the missing endpoints to memberwd.py similar to how they exist in bonanza.py (lines 1244 and 1384)
